Aimin Wendu Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Tianshan Town, Ar Khorchin Banner, Chifeng City, Inner Mongolia

operators: Inner Mongolia Pingmei Ar Khorchin Banner Coal Mine Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Inner Mongolia Pingmei Ar Khorchin Banner Coal Mine Company, which is a subsidiary of Hebei Qian'an Chemical Company.
